sn29.2:4.2: “Mendicants, dragons reproduce in these four ways.
sn29.2:4.4: Dragons are born from an egg, from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously.
sn29.2:4.5: Of these, dragons born from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously are better than those born from an egg.
sn29.2:4.6: Dragons born from moisture or spontaneously are better than those born from an egg or from a womb.
sn29.2:4.7: Dragons born spontaneously are better than those born from an egg, from the womb, or from moisture.
sn29.2:4.8: These are the four ways that dragons reproduce.”
